compatibility.notes: CC-BY-SA-2.1-JP requires that derivative works be licensed under the same terms, which can affect compatibility with more restrictive licenses.

key_requirements: Attribution must be given to the original creator.
Any modifications must be shared under the same license.
License must be included with any copies or derivative works.
license.name: CC-BY-SA-2.1-JP
obligations: You must provide attribution to the original author.
You must share any derivative works under the same license.
You must include a copy of the license or a URI to the license with any distributed copies of the work.
You must include a copy of the license or a URI to the license with any distributed copies of derivative works.
